channel.title: Comments on: Stronger Everyday! – Thursday, October 26, 2017

item.title: By: suebadmin
item.dc:creator: suebadmin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../index.html#comment-220">Wendy Montanari Kilpatrick</a>.
Hi Wendy!
I will send an email to you with our address. If you don't receive it, please email me directly at kim@3wagners.com.
Thank you! Kim
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Wendy Montanari Kilpatrick.

Hi Wendy!

I will send an email to you with our address. If you don’t receive it, please email me directly at kim@3wagners.com.

Thank you!
Kim

item.title: By: Wendy Montanari Kilpatrick
item.dc:creator: Wendy Montanari Kilpatrick
item.description:
Hello from Wendy Montanari, I love reading about Sue B's progress and I am so happy that you kids are there! I know she is thankful, too!
My sister Susan and I have lost track of her (Your?) home address-- Where can we send cards now?
Sending healing thoughts, Wendy
item.content:encoded:
Hello from Wendy Montanari, I love reading about Sue B’s progress and I am so happy that you kids are there! I know she is thankful, too!

My sister Susan and I have lost track of her (Your?) home address– Where can we send cards now?

Sending healing thoughts, Wendy
